  • Method Details

    • operationAvailable

      boolean operationAvailable(ServiceRequestOperation operation)
      Checks the availability of an operation given the service request's current progress and quote status. This method calls invalid input: 'with false toSpecialist and null ServiceRequestStateHandler @param operation to check for availability @return true if the ServiceRequestOperation is available given the service request's status, false otherwise; false is returned for invoice operations'

    • operationAvailable

      boolean operationAvailable(ServiceRequestOperation operation, boolean toSpecialist)
      Checks the availability of an operation given the service request's current progress and quote status. This method calls invalid input: 'with null ServiceRequestStateHandler @param operation to check for availability @return true if the ServiceRequestOperation is available given the service request's status, false otherwise; false is returned for invoice operations'

    • operationAvailable

      boolean operationAvailable(ServiceRequestOperation operation, boolean toSpecialist, ServiceRequestStateHandler stateHandler)
      Checks the availability of an operation given the service request's current progress and quote status.
      Parameters:
      operation - to check for availability
      toSpecialist - whether availability should be checked for specialists or for anyone
      stateHandler - (optional) handler instance for a ServiceRequest
      Returns:
      true if the ServiceRequestOperation is available given the service request's status, false otherwise; false is returned for invoice operations

    • performOperation

      void performOperation(ServiceRequestOperation operation, ServiceRequestOperationContext context)
      Performs an operation on the service request such as adding a quote or canceling the service request. Operations may only be performed on a fully-set-up service request. For example, during the process of creating a service request through the UI, finishSetup() should be called before attempting to perform operations. This method calls invalid input: 'with false isSpecialist and null ServiceRequestStateHandler @param operation to perform @param context that contains the parameters to perform the operation affects how the availability of the operation is computed'

    • performOperation

      void performOperation(ServiceRequestOperation operation, ServiceRequestOperationContext context, boolean isSpecialist)
      Performs an operation on the service request such as adding a quote or canceling the service request. Operations may only be performed on a fully-set-up service request. For example, during the process of creating a service request through the UI, finishSetup() should be called before attempting to perform operations. This method calls invalid input: 'with null ServiceRequestStateHandler @param operation to perform @param context that contains the parameters to perform the operation @param isSpecialist true if the operation is being performed by the specialist; this affects how the availability of the operation is computed'

    • performOperation

      void performOperation(ServiceRequestOperation operation, ServiceRequestOperationContext context, boolean isSpecialist, ServiceRequestStateHandler stateHandler)
      Performs an operation on the service request such as adding a quote or canceling the service request. Operations may only be performed on a fully-set-up service request. For example, during the process of creating a service request through the UI, finishSetup() should be called before attempting to perform operations.
      Parameters:
      operation - to perform
      context - that contains the parameters to perform the operation
      isSpecialist - true if the operation is being performed by the specialist; this affects how the availability of the operation is computed
      stateHandler - (optional) handler instance for a ServiceRequest

    • validateOperationContext

      void validateOperationContext(ServiceRequestOperation operation, ServiceRequestOperationContext context, ServiceRequestStateHandler stateHandler)
      Validate ServiceRequestOperationContext before performing an operation. Required fields and available fields will be validated.
      Parameters:
      operation - to perform
      context - that contains the parameters to perform the operation
      stateHandler - handler instance for a ServiceRequest

    • validateInvoiceOperationContext

      void validateInvoiceOperationContext(ServiceRequestOperation operation, ServiceRequestInvoiceOperationContext context, ServiceRequestStateHandler stateHandler)
      Validate ServiceRequestInvoiceOperationContext before performing an operation. Required fields and available fields will be validated.
      Parameters:
      operation - to perform
      context - that contains the parameters to perform the operation
      stateHandler - handler instance for a ServiceRequest

    • isAlreadyPromoted

      boolean isAlreadyPromoted()
      Has the Service Request been promoted?

    • getPromotionServiceRequest

      ServiceRequest getPromotionServiceRequest()
      Gets the Service Request that was created as a result of a promotion for this Service Request

    • createMinimalServiceRequestQuote

      default ServiceRequestQuote createMinimalServiceRequestQuote()
      Creates a minimal ServiceRequestQuote. Sets the ServiceRequest in the current context as the service request for the quote.
      See Also:
      • to set any additional fields.

    • createMinimalServiceRequestQuote

      ServiceRequestQuote createMinimalServiceRequestQuote(@Nullable ServiceRequestQuote quoteToClone)
      Calls plugin to copy values from an existing ServiceRequestQuote into a newly created ServiceRequestQuote. Sets the ServiceRequest in the current context as the service request for the quote.
      Parameters:
      quoteToClone - existing ServiceRequestQuote to clone into new ServiceRequestQuote
      See Also:
      • to set any additional fields.

    • createMinimalServiceRequestInvoice

      ServiceRequestInvoice createMinimalServiceRequestInvoice()
      This method creates a minimal ServiceRequestInvoice. Sets the ServiceRequest in the current context as the service request for the invoice.
      See Also:
      • to set any additional fields.
